data.name: CrashScreen_Detail
data.value: To help us resolve the problem, please provide a description of what you were doing when it occurred (optional):

data.name: CrashScreen_Email
data.value: Email (optional)

data.name: CrashScreen_EmailText
data.value:
Additionally, you can send us your email in case a member of our support staff needs more information about this error.
By sending the log, I grant my consent to the processing of my personal data (E-mail, Steam ID and IP address) to Keen SWH LTD. United Kingdom and it subsidiaries, in order for these data to be processed for the purpose of tracking the crash and requesting feedback with the intent to improve the game performance. I grant this consent for an indefinite term until my express revocation thereof. I confirm that I have been informed that the provision of these data is voluntary, and that I have the right to request their deletion. Registration is non-transferable. More information about the processing of my personal data in the scope required by legal regulations, in particular Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council, can be found as of 25 May 2018 here.

data.name: CrashScreen_Log
data.value: log

data.name: CrashScreen_MainText
data.value: Space Engineers had a problem and crashed! We apologize for the inconvenience. Please click Send Log if you would like to help us analyze and fix the problem. For more information, check the log below.

data.name: CrashScreen_Title
data.value: Space Engineers Crash

data.name: CrashScreen_Yes
data.value: Send Log

data.name: Error_AlreadyRunning
data.value: Sorry, but {0} is already running on your computer. Only one instance allowed.

data.name: Error_DX11
Error_Error_Caption
data.value: {0} - Application Error

data.name: Error_Error_Message
data.value:
{0} - application error occurred. For more information please see application log at {1}

If you want to help us make {0} a better game, you can send us the log file. No personal data or any sensitive information will be submitted.

Do you want to submit this log to developers?

Thank You!
Keen Software House

Error_GPU_Drivers

Error_GPU_NotDX11
Error_GPU_OldDriver
data.value:
{0} - Warning!

Your '{1}' graphics card driver is older then required.

We strongly recommend udpating the driver. Old drivers might crash the game. Would you like to update the driver?

No - do not display the message again
Cancel - hide the message


Thank You!
Keen Software House
